name: linotify
author: Mathias Punkenhofer
description: Browser extension for lichess.org which notifies you if a certain player is online and/or playing.

scripts.icons: inkscape public/images/lichess.svg --export-png=public/images/linotify_icon16.png -w 16 -h 16 && inkscape public/images/lichess.svg --export-png=public/images/linotify_icon32.png -w 32 -h 32 && inkscape public/images/lichess.svg --export-png=public/images/linotify_icon48.png -w 48 -h 48 && inkscape public/images/lichess.svg --export-png=public/images/linotify_icon64.png -w 64 -h 64 && inkscape public/images/lichess.svg --export-png=public/images/linotify_icon96.png -w 96 -h 96 && inkscape public/images/lichess.svg --export-png=public/images/linotify_icon128.png -w 128 -h 128
